44 #include "fulldemo.hpp"
45 #include <string>
46 
47 using namespace std;
48 
49 namespace Tapi
50 {
51 // Constructor/Desctructor
52 
53 FullDemo::FullDemo(ros::NodeHandle* nh) : nh(nh)
54 {
55  // Create the asynchronous spinner which sends an receives data in the backround and calls the callback routines.
56  spinner = new ros::AsyncSpinner(1);
57  spinner->start();
58 
59  // Create the Publisher helper object and the Publisher itself
60  tpub = new Tapi::Publisher(nh, "Test");
61  pub = tpub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Bool>("testbutton", 10);
62 
63  // Initial value
64  turn = false;
65 
66  // Create the Subscriber
67  tsub = new Tapi::Subscriber(nh, "Test2");
68  ros::SubscribeOptions opt;
69  opt = SubscribeOptionsForTapi(std_msgs::Bool, 10, &FullDemo::gotit);
70  tsub->AddFeature(opt, "test");
71 
72  // Create the ServiceServer
73  tserv = new Tapi::ServiceServer(nh, "TestServiceServer");
74  ros::AdvertiseServiceOptions opt2;
75  opt2 = ServiceServerOptionsForTapi(tapi_lib::Hello, &FullDemo::hello);
76  tserv->AddFeature(opt2, "ServiceServer");
77 
78  // Create the ServiceClient
79  tclient = new Tapi::ServiceClient(nh, "TestServiceClient");
80  serviceclient = tclient->AddFeature<tapi_lib::Hello>("hallo");
81 }
82 
83 FullDemo::~FullDemo()
84 {
85  delete spinner;
86  delete tpub;
87  delete tsub;
88  delete tserv;
89  delete tclient;
90 }
91 
92 void FullDemo::Send()
93 {
94  // Create a Bool message and publish it
95  std_msgs::Bool temp;
96  temp.data = turn;
97  pub->publish(temp);
98 
99  // Check if the ServiceClient is connected and if yes call it
100  if (*serviceclient)
101  {
102  tapi_lib::Hello msg;
103  if ((*serviceclient)->call(msg))
104  ROS_INFO("Got response :)");
105  else
106  ROS_INFO("No response :(");
107  }
108 
109  // Change the value of turn to send a different Bool message next time
110  if (turn)
111  turn = false;
112  else
113  turn = true;
114 }
115 
116 void FullDemo::gotit(const std_msgs::Bool::ConstPtr& msg)
117 {
118  ROS_INFO("%d", msg->data);
119 }
120 
121 bool FullDemo::hello(tapi_lib::Hello::Request& helloReq, tapi_lib::Hello::Response& helloResp)
122 {
123  ROS_INFO("Service call!");
124  helloResp.Status = tapi_lib::HelloResponse::StatusError;
125  return true;
126 }
127 }
128 
138 int main(int argc, char** argv)
139 {
140  ros::init(argc, argv, "Tapi_FullDemo");
141  ros::NodeHandle nh;
142  Tapi::FullDemo test(&nh);
143  ros::Rate loop_rate(2);
144  while (ros::ok())
145  {
146  test.Send();
147  loop_rate.sleep();
148  }
149 
150  return 0;
151 }
